name: TitleText
description:
In Title Text, you try to go the furthest you can get, but with a twist: After every successful jump the game "Rolls the Dice" and adds a good or bad modifier to the game.  You start off with a high chance for good modifiers and as you progress the chance of rolling bad modifiers increases.

Modifiers:

Good:
Increase Platform Size
Show Landing Spot

Bad:
Decrease Platform Size
Hide Landing Spot

Controls:

Jump
Keyboard: Spacebar
Gamepad: South button
Touchscreen: Tap and Hold

That's all ;)

The Mac and Linux builds were not tested, I hope they work :)

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022
